parameter.name: accountId
parameter.description: The accountId of the account that the user is using, returned in the Login response.

parameter.name: count
parameter.description: Number of records to return in the cache.

parameter.name: folder
parameter.description: The query value can be a folder name or folder ID.

parameter.name: folderIds
parameter.description: A comma separated list of folder ID GUIDs.

parameter.name: fromDate
parameter.description: Start of the search date range. Only returns templates created on or after this date and time.

parameter.name: include
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of additional template attributes to include in the response.

parameter.name: order
parameter.description: Sets the direction order used to sort the list. Valid values(asc,desc).

parameter.name: orderBy
parameter.description: Sets the file attribute used to sort the list.

parameter.name: searchText
parameter.description: The search text used to search the names of templates.

parameter.name: shared
parameter.description: The accountId of the account that the user is using, returned in the Login response.

parameter.name: sharedByMe
parameter.description: If true, the response only includes templates shared by the user. If false, the response only returns template not shared by the user. If not specified, the response is not affected.

parameter.name: startPosition
parameter.description: The starting index for the first template shown in the response. This must be greater than or equal to zero.

parameter.name: toDate
parameter.description: End of the search date range.

parameter.name: usedFromDate
parameter.description: Start of the search date range.

parameter.name: usedToDate
parameter.description: End of the search date range.

parameter.name: userFilter
parameter.description: Sets if the templates shown in the response Valid values(owned_by_me,shared_with_me).
